cds2aa

Source: R/cds2aa.R
cds2aa.Rd

This function translates a DNAStringSet into an AAStringSet.

cds2aa(cds)

Arguments

cds

DNAStringSet [mandatory]

Value

AAStringSet

See also

DNAStringSet, AAStringSet, translate

Examples

##load example sequence data
data("ath", package="CRBHits")
cds2aa(ath)
#> AAStringSet object of length 1000:
#>        width seq                                            names
